arts.ttl: Shuto Machino stars in dramatic 2-2 draw as Holstein Kiel register their first ever point in the Bundesliga
arts.sum: Shuto Machino's late equaliser saw Holstein Kiel draw 2-2 in a thrilling match away to VfL Bochum, which secured them their first ever point in the Bundesliga, following their historic promotion last season. The goals came from Benedikt Pichler and Shuto Machino in a thrilling 2-2 draw away to VfL Bochum 1848, ensuring that this result will live long in the memory for the club from Schleswig-Holstein.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Bayern unstoppable, Freiburg on fire, Union Berlin down TSG, Bochum and Kiel inseparable
arts.sum: Another thrilling bout of 15:30 kickoffs from across the Bundesrepublik has come and gone with fantastic football aplenty. Matchday 4 yielded impressive victories for Bayern Munich and SC Freiburg over Werder Bremen and Heidenheim respectively. Elsewhere, Union Berlin made early chances count against TSG Hoffenheim, while Bochum and Holstein Kiel played out a tense 2-2 stalemate to earn their first points of the season.

arts.ttl: Bochum's Miyoshi ruled out against Kiel
arts.sum: VfL Bochum trainer Peter Zeidler unfortunately had to confirm the loss of one of his more promising players thus far this season ahead of tomorrow's league encounter against Kiel.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs Holstein Kiel preview: Early six-pointer
arts.sum: This weekend's tussle between Bochum and Holstein Kiel is set to be a potential six-pointer just four matches into the season. Both sides still look for their first win as they prepare to face off at the Ruhrstadion.
